body.name: Workplace Metal First Aid Kit - 4 Shelf Wall Mount Cabinet with Medications - Commercial Grade OSHA Compliant First Aid Kit for Businesses - Large Metal First Aid Box for Office with Refill
features: COMPLIANCE ASSURED: This professional first aid kit contains all the essential supplies to meet ANSI Z308.1-2021 Standard for Class B first aid kits minimum requirements as well as the additional ANSI recommended items. It's perfect for businesses, shops, and offices, ensuring you're prepared for any medical emergency.

DISPENSING BOXES FOR EASY ACCESS: Packed with the Medifirst brand of bandages and medications, this first aid kit box features easy-to-use dispensing boxes, making it quick and convenient to find the supplies you need during emergencies.

STURDY METAL CABINET: Our industrial first aid kit comes in a heavy-duty metal cabinet that can be wall-mounted or carried. The baked, white enamel cabinet boasts four shelves and a handy door pouch for storing smaller first aid supplies, providing ample space for organization.

GENEROUS STORAGE: With dimensions of 22 1/4 H x 15 1/4 W x 6 D inches, this first aid kit for work is compact yet spacious, offering ample room to store a wide range of first aid supplies, keeping your workplace safe and prepared.

CLEARLY MARKED AND REFILLABLE: Imprinted with the words "FIRST AID" on the front, our emergency medical kit provides clear identification for easy access. It also comes with reorder/refilling instructions, ensuring your kit is always well-stocked and ready for any emergency.
body.description: Elevate Safety: Unveiling the Ultimate Metal First Aid Kit for Your Workplace! Empower Your Business with Excellent Preparedness and Protection Introducing the MFASCO Workplace Metal First Aid Kit – your gateway to a safer, more secure work environment. Don't settle for ordinary when you can have extraordinary readiness at your fingertips. Complying with ANSI standards and surpassing expectations, this kit is your partner in safeguarding your team. Beyond Compliance : Rise above the norm with a first aid kit that doesn't just meet standards, but defines them. Extra items, extra care – because your safety deserves nothing less. Swift Solutions in a Snap : No time to waste during emergencies. Our smart dispensing boxes make finding supplies a breeze, ensuring you're ready to act at a moment's notice. Space Meets Versatility : Compact in size, colossal in capability. With generous storage, you'll have room for essentials and more, letting you tackle any situation with confidence. Quick Spot, Quick Refill : In the chaos, clarity matters. The bold "FIRST AID" label guides you, while easy refill instructions keep you ahead of the game, ensuring no gaps in your protection. Comfort Items Included : Medications that matter, because every second counts. With this kit, you're not just equipped – you're empowered.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 60 Years of Safety Excellence: MFASCO Health & Safety Born in Detroit, Raised by Excellence – MFASCO Health & Safety is a family-owned legend crafting safety solutions for 60 years. From manufacturers to schools, we’re your shield in emergencies. Trust us for top-tier supplies, and a promise: Safety, Simplified. – Unveil Safety, Unveil MFASCO Upgrade your workplace safety game with the MFASCO Workplace Metal First Aid Kit. Prepare for the unexpected, because when it comes to your team, only the best will do. Elevate Safety: Unveiling the Ultimate Metal First Aid Kit for Your Workplace! Empower Your Business with Excellent Preparedness and Protection Introducing the MFASCO Workplace Metal First Aid Kit – your gateway to a safer, more secure work environment. Don't settle for ordinary when you can have extraordinary readiness at your fingertips. Complying with ANSI standards and surpassing expectations, this kit is your partner in safeguarding your team. Swift Solutions in a Snap : No time to waste during emergencies. Our smart dispensing boxes make finding supplies a breeze, ensuring you're ready to act at a moment's notice. Space Meets Versatility : Compact in size, colossal in capability. With generous storage, you'll have room for essentials and more, letting you tackle any situation with confidence. Quick Spot, Quick Refill : In the chaos, clarity matters. The bold "FIRST AID" label guides you, while easy refill instructions keep you ahead of the game, ensuring no gaps in your protection. Comfort Items Included : Medications that matter, because every second counts. With this kit, you're not just equipped – you're empowered.

Can Be Wall Mounted Maximize both safety and space with the versatile design of the MFASCO Workplace Metal First Aid Kit. This remarkable kit is your ultimate solution for strategic placement, ensuring instant accessibility and creating a safety hub right where you need it most. Hang it proudly on any wall, transforming even the tightest corners into a first aid haven. Can Be Carried From office to workshop, from field to classroom – our carry-friendly kit lets you carry confidence in your hands. Be ready to respond swiftly to any medical situation, whether it's a minor mishap or a more serious incident. Refillable Emergencies don't wait, and neither should your preparedness. With a refillable kit, you're always ahead of the curve. Reorder supplies before they deplete, ensuring you're perpetually equipped for any medical situation. Kit Dimensions Despite its modest dimensions, this kit offers an impressive capacity. Ample space ensures you're prepared for a diverse range of emergencies, keeping your workplace secure and your peace of mind intact.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars perfect for my office

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This case has many supplies.
reviews.reviewText: This has all you need for your shop.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Meets OSHA requirement needed for our shop. Easy to install. Much better option that paying a service company to check and fill bi-monthly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice kit

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 15, 2021
reviews.reviewText: Very well put together and was shipped in a timely manner.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 11, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars value and complete
reviews.reviewText: much cheaper than having a safety shop sell you this kit

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars very complete but had a torn pocket
reviews.reviewText: Very nice but pockets are cheap. Had a torn pocket on the door right out of the box. Otherwise a nice cabinet fully stocked.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 6, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great first aid kit.
reviews.reviewText: It was delivered to me by the date stated during the order process. It came just as described. It's a great first aid kit for my shop.
